column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We ordered 6 tapas including: Spanish Cheese
column3: spicy potatoes and the chicken and ham croquetas. I have to say all the dishes were FANTASTIC!!!! They were also brought out very promptly
column4: but not all at once which was appreciated since we were only sitting at the bar. My favorite I think were the spicy potatoes
column5: but you really can't go wrong with anything you order. So by 9:15 we had drinks
column6: were fed and paid...15 min before our proposed seating time!
